name: Rahin Jegarajaratnam
body:
My name is Rahin Jegarajaratnam and I am a 3A Computer Engineering student at the University of Waterloo.  Currently, I am a software developer for SAP AG focusing on mobile development.  The purpose of this website is to give people an opportunity to learn more about me and any projects I'm involved in.  

If you want to know more, feel free to contact me by email which you can find in the About me page.

Enjoy!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
